thread.title: Great location and great breakfast
thread.title_full: Great location and great breakfast - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mako555
title: Great location and great breakfast
text: Fantastic location, 5-6 blocks from Times Square. Interior not very new but in quite good shape. Great Times Square view from selected rooms. Fantastic breakfast - much better than in most US hotels - probably because of European roots of Accor network.
